original_text:
American Dad
Tornano le avventure strampalate e divertenti della famiglia più moderna che abbiamo imparato a conoscere grazie alla televisione: parliamo di American Dad che in questo caso viene adattato per il gioco online. Playtech ha realizzato una macchinetta sulla famosa famiglia del ‘Papà Americano’ partendo da 5 rulli e 40 linee di pagamento facilmente giocabili non solo da desktop ma anche da dispositivi mobile. Insieme a Stan, Roger, Francine, Hayley, Wheels e Legman il giocatore avrà la possibilità di scoprire le diverse funzioni bonus che passano anche per le 5 opzioni di giri gratuiti che si basano proprio sui nostri protagonisti. In palio ci sono tantissime vincite: dai 25 giri gratuiti ai simboli di Stan impilati, senza dimenticare Wild in espansione e moltiplicatori progressivi con un massimo di 10x.
Grafica e simboli di gioco
La grafica è ovviamente ispirata alla serie di cartoon che abbiamo visto tutti almeno una volta nella vita. Sullo sfondo quindi ritroviamo la tipica ambientazione di Langley Falls e le animazioni che si alternano durante il gameplay sono quelle che imitano la serie. Tra i simboli con valore basso abbiamo A, K e Q proposti nei tre colori che richiamano la bandiera americana, ovvero rosso, bianco e blu. Ma il pezzo forte è rappresentato dai simboli con valore maggiore che sono rappresentati dai protagonisti del cartone: troviamo così il figlio Steve e sua sorella Hayley, l’animale domestico Klaus, mamma Francine e papà Stan. Proprio il capo famiglia è quello che offre una ricompensa maggiore fino a 250 monete se appare 5 volte su un payline. Il Jolly è l’alieno Roger che prende il posto di tutti i simboli sui rulli ma non del bonus Schmooblydong che è il simbolo più prezioso capace di offrire 750 monete se formi una combinazione di 5 simboli. Considera che la ruota Schmooblydong è fondamentale per questa slot: se appare sui rulli 1 e 3 ti regala un nuovo giro e se lo posizioni anche nel rullo 5 puoi sbloccare la funzione Free spin. Si determina così con quale personaggio giocherai oltre al numero di giri che ottieni: si va da un minimo di 3 e si sale a 5, 8, 10 e un massimo di 25 spin.
Tra le funzioni più valide della slot American Dad citiamo la Random Wilds di Roger dove si posizionano casualmente dei Jolly per ogni giro gratuito, aumentando così la possibilità di vincita. Se sei alla ricerca di un moltiplicatore devi cercare la funzione progressiva di Hayley, che determina il valore massimo di vincita da 2x, 3x, 5x fino a 10x. E non dimentichiamo poi il ruolo di Wheels e Legman, che lasciano una scia di simboli jolly sui rulli per ogni spin gratuito.
Considerazioni finali sulla slot American Dad
Le funzionalità del gioco sono davvero tante e costruite in modo preciso per realizzare un preciso obiettivo. Playtech ha fatto un ottimo lavoro sia per grafica che animazioni, senza però tralasciare i game extra che incontri giro dopo giro.
L’esperienza di gioco è sicuramente divertente e lo sarà non solo se sei un fan della serie, perché i suoi bonus sanno essere davvero gratificanti.

raw_translation.response:
American Dad
The zany and amusing adventures of the most modern family we've come to know on television are back: we're talking about American Dad, which is now adapted for online gaming. Playtech has brought to life a slot machine about the famous family of the 'American Dad', starting from 5 reels and 40 paylines that are easily playable not only on desktop but also on mobile devices. Together with Stan, Roger, Francine, Hayley, Wheels, and Legman, the player will have the opportunity to discover a range of bonus features that include 5 options for free spins featuring our beloved protagonists. The stakes are high with a chance to win big, ranging from 25 free spins to stacked Stan symbols, not forgetting the expanding Wilds and progressive multipliers with a maximum of 10x.

Graphics and Game Symbols
The graphics are obviously inspired by the cartoon series that we have all seen at least once in our life. So, in the background, we find the typical setting of Langley Falls, and the animations that alternate during gameplay are those that imitate the series. Among the low-value symbols, we have A, K and Q offered in the three colors that recall the American flag, namely red, white, and blue. But the real highlight is represented by the high-value symbols, which are represented by the protagonists of the cartoon: we find Steve and his sister Hayley, the family pet Klaus, mom Francine, and dad Stan. Precisely, the head of the family offers the highest reward of up to 250 coins if he appears five times on a payline. The Wild symbol is the alien Roger, who replaces all symbols on the reels except for the Schmooblydong bonus, which, if you form a combination of 5 symbols, is the most valuable symbol that can offer 750 coins. Bear in mind that the Schmooblydong wheel is essential for this slot: if it appears on reels 1 and 3, it gives you a new spin, and if you position it on reel 5, you can unlock the Free spin function. This determines which character you will play with, as well as the number of spins you get, ranging from a minimum of 3 to 5, 8, 10, and a maximum of 25 spins.

Among the most valid functions of the American Dad slot, we mention Roger's Random Wilds, where Wild symbols are randomly placed on each free spin, thereby increasing your chances of winning. If you are looking for a multiplier, you need to look for Hayley's progressive function, which determines the maximum win value ranging from 2x, 3x, 5x to 10x. And let's not forget the role of Wheels and Legman, who leave a trail of Wild symbols on the reels for each free spin.

Final Considerations on the American Dad Slot
The game's functionalities are many and precisely designed to achieve a specific goal. Playtech has done an excellent job with both graphics and animations, without neglecting the game extras that you encounter from spin to spin.

The gaming experience is undoubtedly fun and will be gratifying not only if you are a fan of the series, but because the bonuses are genuinely rewarding.

Playtech has done a fantastic job with the game's audio as well, from the cheesy soundtrack to the character-themed sound effects. In conclusion, the American Dad slot game is a thrilling entertainment experience that every fan of the show should try. With its comical characters, engaging graphics and animations, and a slew of bonuses, this game has everything you need to unwind and have a good time. So, suit up and join the Smiths in this hilarious and profitable adventure.

The Wild symbol is represented by the alien, Roger, while the most valuable symbol is the Schmooblydong bonus symbol that can offer up to 750 coins if a combination of 5 symbols is formed. Bonus Features

American Dad offers players a range of bonus features, including five options for free spins, each with its unique rules and rewards. The bonus features also include Roger's Random Wilds, where Wild symbols are randomly placed on each free spin, increasing the player's chances of winning. Hayley's progressive function provides multipliers of up to 10x for maximum win value, and Wheels and Legman leave a trail of Wild symbols on the reels for each free spin. The bonus features are well-designed, offer players a wide range of rewards and add to the entertainment value of the game.

Appeal to Fans of the TV Show

American Dad is an online slot game inspired by the cartoon series of the same name, and fans of the TV show will undoubtedly enjoy playing this game. The graphics and symbols used in the game are familiar and inspired by the TV show, providing a sense of nostalgia and entertainment for fans. The bonus features are also designed to fit with the show's theme and offer rewards based on the characters and the story, making it all the more enjoyable for fans of the TV show. However, even if you have never seen the show, the game's functionalities and rewards still make it a fun and entertaining experience for everyone.

The zany and amusing adventures of the most modern family we've come to know on television are back: we're talking about American Dad, which is now adapted for online gaming. Playtech has brought to life a slot machine about the famous family of the 'American Dad', starting from 5 reels and 40 paylines that are easily playable not only on desktop but also on mobile devices. Together with Stan, Roger, Francine, Hayley, Wheels, and Legman, the player will have the opportunity to discover a range of bonus features that include 5 options for free spins featuring our beloved protagonists. The stakes are high with a chance to win big, ranging from 25 free spins to stacked Stan symbols, not forgetting the expanding Wilds and progressive multipliers with a maximum of 10x.

Graphics and Game Symbols
The graphics are obviously inspired by the cartoon series that we have all seen at least once in our life. So, in the background, we find the typical setting of Langley Falls, and the animations that alternate during gameplay are those that imitate the series. Among the low-value symbols, we have A, K and Q offered in the three colors that recall the American flag, namely red, white, and blue. But the real highlight is represented by the high-value symbols, which are represented by the protagonists of the cartoon: we find Steve and his sister Hayley, the family pet Klaus, mom Francine, and dad Stan. Precisely, the head of the family offers the highest reward of up to 250 coins if he appears five times on a payline. The Wild symbol is the alien Roger, who replaces all symbols on the reels except for the Schmooblydong bonus, which, if you form a combination of 5 symbols, is the most valuable symbol that can offer 750 coins. Bear in mind that the Schmooblydong wheel is essential for this slot: if it appears on reels 1 and 3, it gives you a new spin, and if you position it on reel 5, you can unlock the Free spin function. This determines which character you will play with, as well as the number of spins you get, ranging from a minimum of 3 to 5, 8, 10, and a maximum of 25 spins.

Among the most valid functions of the American Dad slot, we mention Roger's Random Wilds, where Wild symbols are randomly placed on each free spin, thereby increasing your chances of winning. If you are looking for a multiplier, you need to look for Hayley's progressive function, which determines the maximum win value ranging from 2x, 3x, 5x to 10x. And let's not forget the role of Wheels and Legman, who leave a trail of Wild symbols on the reels for each free spin.

Final Considerations on the American Dad Slot
The game's functionalities are many and precisely designed to achieve a specific goal. Playtech has done an excellent job with both graphics and animations, without neglecting the game extras that you encounter from spin to spin.

The gaming experience is undoubtedly fun and will be gratifying not only if you are a fan of the series, but because the bonuses are genuinely rewarding.
